Uses of Class
net.flybyte.virgo.BaseMojo

Packages that use BaseMojo
net.flybyte.virgo.deployer   
net.flybyte.virgo.server   
 

Uses of BaseMojo in net.flybyte.virgo.deployer
 

Subclasses of BaseMojo in net.flybyte.virgo.deployer
 class Deploy
          Deploys a maven artefact (bundle) at runtime to Eclipse Virgo via the deployer MBean.
 class Refresh
          Refresh a single module of the application which was deployed from the given URI via Eclipse Virgo's MBean.
 class RefreshBundle
          Refresh any bundle with the given symbolic name and version and any bundles cloned from a bundle with the given symbolic name and version.
 class Undeploy
          Undeploys an already deployed maven artefact from Eclipse Virgo via the deployer MBean.
 

Uses of BaseMojo in net.flybyte.virgo.server
 

Subclasses of BaseMojo in net.flybyte.virgo.server
 class ImmediateShutdown
          Stops a running Eclipse Virgo instance immediately.
 class Shutdown
          Stops a running Eclipse Virgo instance.
 class Start
          Starts a Eclipse Virgo instance by executing the provided startup script.
